hero.title: Timeless Cycling
hero.subtitle: Discover high-quality bicycles and accessories, carefully selected to meet your cycling needs. Each product combines excellent craftsmanship with modern functionality.

products.title: Our Products
products.subtitle: Each product in our collection has been carefully selected to offer you the best quality bicycles and accessories for your cycling adventures.

1.name: Urban Cruiser 250
1.description: Entry-level electric city bike with 250W motor perfect for daily commuting

2.name: StepThrough Pro 500
2.description: Mid-range electric step-through with 500W motor and extended 50km range

3.name: Commuter Elite 750
3.description: High-performance 750W electric bike with 7-speed Shimano and dual suspension

4.name: Cargo Master 750X
4.description: Heavy-duty 750W cargo e-bike with LED signals and premium accessories

5.name: E-Explorer
5.description: Retro adventure e-bike with premium leather accessories

6.name: E-Folding
6.description: Compact electric folder with classic design elements

features.title: Why Choose Us
features.subtitle: Our passion for cycling is reflected in every service we provide. We offer professional expertise and quality products for all your cycling needs.

1.title: Expert Service
1.description: Professional maintenance and repair services for all types of bicycles with certified technicians

2.title: Quality Products
2.description: High-quality bicycles and accessories from trusted brands worldwide

3.title: Personal Consultation
3.description: One-on-one consultation to find the perfect cycling solution for your needs

contact.title: Let's Connect
contact.subtitle: Ready to discover your perfect cycling companion? Get in touch and let us help you find exactly what you're looking for.

home.title: FLUX & CO - Classic Cycling Heritage | Premium Electric Bikes Taiwan
home.description: Discover high-quality electric bicycles and accessories at FLUX & CO. Premium e-bikes with classic design, perfect for urban commuting and cycling adventures in Taiwan.

error.title: Oops! Something went wrong
error.message: We couldn't send your message. Don't worry, you can try again or contact us directly.

introduction.title: Information We Collect
introduction.content: We only collect information that you voluntarily provide to us through our contact forms, including your name, email address, and any messages you send to us.

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.content: We use your contact information solely to respond to your inquiries about our bicycles and services. We will contact you via email or phone to answer your questions and provide product information.

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or share your personal information with third parties. Your information is kept confidential and is only used by our team to serve you better.

formsubmit.title: Third-Party Form Processing
formsubmit.content: We use FormSubmit.co, a third-party service, to process and deliver contact form submissions to us via email. When you submit a contact form, your information (name, email, phone number, and message) is transmitted to FormSubmit's servers for processing and delivery. FormSubmit acts as a data processor on our behalf and is subject to their own privacy policy. We have chosen FormSubmit for its reliability in handling form submissions securely. For more information about how FormSubmit handles your data, please review their privacy policy at

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: We keep your contact information only as long as necessary to respond to your inquiry and provide follow-up service. You can request removal of your information at any time.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or want to request removal of your information, please contact us:
contact.address: Address: No. 7-4, Jinmen Street, Zhongzheng District
